entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 06:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
